summary: In the 17th century Spain, Minister of Finance tries to dishonour the queen. But his plan is too much intricate.
cast: Louis de Funès|Yves Montand|Alice Sapritch|Karin Schubert|Alberto de Mendoza|Don Jaime de Mora y Aragón|Eduardo Fajardo|Antonio Pica|Joaquín Solís|Venantino Venantini|Gabriele Tinti|Paul Préboist|Sal Borgese|Astrid Frank|Robert Le Béal|Clément Michu|La Polaca|Leopoldo Trieste|Fernando Bilbao|Xan das Bolas|Frank Braña|Roger Carel|Fabián Conde|Fernando Hilbeck|Antonio Iranzo|Frédéric Norbert|Ricardo Palacios|Lita Recio|Jesús Tordesillas|Pierre Tornade|Ángel Álvarez
keywords: male objectification|time bomb|reference to diego velazquez|17th century|tax collector
title: Delirios de grandeza
